This is a 1 Bedroom, 1 Bath, approximately 525 Sq.
Ft.
Our community is conveniently located minutes from I-25, and the Region Transportation line.
Close proximity to some of the area's largest employers such as Global Technology Resources and Integrated Asset Services makes your commute a breeze.
Parkwood Plaza is a pet-friendly apartment community in Denver that uniquely offers only one bedroom apartments .
Your pet will enjoy our beautiful surroundings that will allow them to run and play.
Close to our property is A Dog's Day Grooming which will help your pet look their best while they play at the near-by Garfield Lake Park.
Come visit us at Parkwood Plaza.
Features:
Walk-In Closets, Range, Disposal, Ceiling Fans, Dishwasher, Window Coverings, Air Conditioning, Heating, Refrigerator
Community Amenities:
BBQ/Picnic Area, Laundry Facilities, Spanish Speaking Staff, Transportation
Pet Policy
